exit.span: THIS IS A TERMINATE! DO NOT BACK UP AND CONTINUE ANSWERING. ALERT YOUR SUPERVISOR IMMEDIATELY!

samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey. This is an over quota.
Thank you for taking our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated! THIS IS A COMPLETE.

block.label: Logistics

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p:
HELLO AND WELCOME TO OUR SURVEY!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY.
WHILE GOING THROUGH THE SURVEY, PLEASE USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS AND IMAGES. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS.
THANK YOU AGAIN! LET’S BEGIN…

block.label: Screener

select.label: S_State
select.title: Please select the US state in which you currently live.

term.label: te1
term.cond: (S_State.AL or S_State.KY or S_State.MS or S_State.UT)

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: Please state your gender.

number.label: S_Age
number.title: Please type in your age below.

radio.label: S_Children
radio.title: Do you have any children ages 6-12?

radio.label: S_Children2
radio.title: Is your 6-12 year old child with you right now?

radio.label: S_ChildGender
radio.title: Is your child a boy or a girl?

radio.label: S_ChildAge
radio.title: How old is your child?

radio.label: S_ChildPermission
radio.title: Would you allow your 6–12-year-old child to answer a few questions in this survey?

block.html: Thank you for your permission. We will let you know when to give your phone to your child to answer our questions. Before that, we have a few more questions for you

checkbox.label: S_Category
checkbox.title: In the past year, which of the following products, if any, have you bought for your 6–12-year-old child online?
checkbox.row: Action Figures/ Accessories/ Action Role Play (e.g. Batman, Superman, etc)
Action Play Toys and dress up (e.g. Nerf guns, foam swords, etc.)
Arts & Crafts Toys (e.g. paint kits, beads, clay and dough, slime & putty, etc.)
Board Games/ Puzzles (e.g. Monopoly, Chess, Rubik's Cube, etc.)
Construction toys/ building sets (e.g. LEGO, DUPLO, Mega Bloks, Enlighten, etc)
Vehicles (e.g. Cars, Trucks, Trains, etc - excluding ride-on toys)
Dolls (e.g. Barbie, baby dolls, LOL Surprise!, Enchantimals, Mimi, Jouju etc)Outdoor & Sports Toys (e.g. footballs, water guns, etc. – excluding sports equipment)
Plush/ Stuffed Animals/ Interactive plush (e.g. Hatchimals)
Science/ Learning Toys (e.g. science kits, Leapfrog, etc.)
Youth Electronics (e.g. kids' tablets, electronic entertainment, excluding video games)
Other traditional toys – excludes video games or equipment and hobby toys

block.label: Quotas
block.exec: if PhaseQ.r1: Phase.val=0 if PhaseQ.r2: Phase.val=1 if PhaseQ.r3: Phase.val=2 if PhaseQ.r4: Phase.val=3 if PhaseQ.r5: Phase.val=4 if PhaseQ.r6: Phase.val=5 if PhaseQ.r7: Phase.val=6 if PhaseQ.r8: Phase.val=7 if PhaseQ.r9: Phase.val=8 if PhaseQ.r10: Phase.val=9 if PhaseQ.r11: Phase.val=10 if PhaseQ.r12: Phase.val=11 if PhaseQ.r13: Phase.val=12 if PhaseQ.r14: Phase.val=13 if PhaseQ.r15: Phase.val=14 if PhaseQ.r16: Phase.val=15 if PhaseQ.r17: Phase.val=16 if PhaseQ.r18: Phase.val=17 if PhaseQ.r19: Phase.val=18 if PhaseQ.r20: Phase.val=19

radio.label: Phase
radio.title: Phase

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

radio.label: RedHerringCheck
radio.title: Which of the following is not a color?

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Congratulations! You qualify!Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve products which may be confidential. By signing this agreement you agree as follows:
You will hold in confidence any information about the products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this research.
You will use information disclosed to you only for the purpose of participating in this consumer study, and you will not otherwise use the information for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
Child Participation Consent:By signing below, you consent to your child’s participation in this survey.
GDPR Disclaimer:We take every reasonable precaution to ensure the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey.
At no time will the information you provided be used for any purpose other than research and you will in no way be adversely affected by taking part.
Behaviorally does not capture or store personal information, but merely logs the user’s IP address which is automatically recognized by the web server.
This information is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

block.label: ParentBlock
block.builder:title: PDP CAROUSEL IMAGES

html.label: parent_intro
html.b: This first section should be completed by the parent. Please take a few minutes to answer the following questions. Once you are done, we will ask you to hand over your phone to your 6–12-year-old child to answer a couple of questions.

block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for toys online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you like it for your child or swipe left if you do not.

radio.label: Q_1
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘ I like it for my child and
swipe left ← for ‘ I do not like it for my child

col.label: c1
col.b: I do not like it for my child

col.label: c2
col.b: I like it for my child

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for toys online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you would buy the product based on the image or swipe left if you would not buy it.

radio.label: Q_2
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Buy this product’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Do not buy this product’

col.label: c1
col.b: I would not bye it

col.label: c2
col.b: I would bye it

block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for toys online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if it is easy to see what’s included or swipe left if it is not easy to see what’s included.

radio.label: Q_3
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Is easy to see what’s included ’ and
swipe left ← for ‘ Is not easy to see what’s included ’

col.label: c1
col.b: Is not easy to see what’s included

col.label: c2
col.b: Is easy to see what’s included

block.label: childBlock
block.builder:title: PDP CAROUSEL IMAGES

html.label: childsection
html.b: The next few questions should be answered by your 6-12 year old child. They will be similar to the questions you just answered. Please hand over your phone to your 6-12 year old child and ask them to answer our questions, and please feel free to help your child as needed.

block.html: Look at the images below, swipe right if you like it or swipe left if you do not like it.

radio.label: Q_10
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘ I like it and
swipe left ← for I do not like it

col.label: c1
col.b: I do not like it

col.label: c2
